root:
Paladin The paladin wears plate armor won through success in arena combat. It was bathed in the blood of his final enemy, a nefarious shadow priest. It protects well, and doesn't hinder mobility much.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Paladin calls upon divine magic to assist allies while smiting his enemies. He gathers divine energy through holy strikes and judgments, powering his abilities. Upon noticing support spells, enemies will be likely to attack him.
In war, the Paladin inspired his comrades with displays of courage and tales of returning home. They were less likely to crack under pressure, and survived terrible bodily afflictions. Each blow upon his body strengthens his will.
We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads. We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads.
Divine Storm Holy Light Judgment Hammer of Justice Free Action
Crusader Strike Holy Light Judgment Sacred Shield Divine Storm Blessing of Freedom Hammer of Justice Move Crusader Strike Holy Light Judgment Sacred Shield Divine Storm Blessing of Freedom Hammer of Justice
Challenger's Greatsword Rival's Greatsword Duelist's Greatsword Gladiator's Greatsword "Runed Greatsword" Cataclysmic Gladiator's Greatsword Challenger's Armor Rival's Armor Duelist's Armor Gladiator's Armor "Arbiter's Armor" Cataclysmic Gladiator's Armor
Others:
One step closer to home.
Wound Care Encourage Pep Talk Hope Vengeance Cleanse Eye for an Eye Blessing of Kings
Seal of Command Seal of Insight "This is my last adventure. I will return home." Seal of Blood Wistful Locket "This is my last adventure. I will return home." Seal of Justice Seal of Sanctuary Seal of Vengeance Winds of Forgiveness "Forgive me of the evil I commit. I do it for our family." Offensive Skill
I did this daily in the arena. Why not use a spell? Out of mana! These are special Frostweave Bandages.
Like Stromgarde, this place has hope. Remain stout. The Light shines upon us. Hey, the worst is behind us.
If they're well armored, aim for joins and exposures. Stand with me. I'll defend you, my friend. You'll be fine with me-- I earned this blade.
My homeland was once a majestic military nation. It may be in ruins, but it'll live through me. I joined the defense of a legendary bridge in my youth. My nation fought alone for days-- but it held the line. We will, too. I dream of settling with my family. After this is finished, I'd like to be neighbors with you all.
My homeland was reduced to rubble. They'll pay for that. *He sharpens his blade with a whetstone, hypnotically focused.* My parents died to forest trolls. I enlisted the next day.
Breathe. The pain should subside. In my youth, I could use this spell non-stop! Now... Your face has some color again. Good.
My body won't break before they do. Let them target me. I'm used to it. "Focus the paladin!" Hah, never gets old.
...
No... Let this veteran rest. I'm comfortable as I am. I recall defending Thandol Span without you.
Justice. I will save my country. One fewer to pillage our granary, eh? My nation taught me war! What did yours teach you? I learned THAT in the arena! Break yourselves upon my body! Vengeance for Stromgarde!
A fierce veteran of holy purpose, he has come to cleanse this land through war and prayer. Deus Vult
No-- I must survive!
There are trolls in the bushes!
OF COURSE! Hit the paladin. An old strategy!
We're Light-forsaken scrubs.
I never get enough!
Stromgarde will remain a ruin...
I need more Conquest for my shoes!
Formations! Hold, and we'll claim victory!
I will defend you with my life!
Attack the back row. Control the front.
I'm a Gladiator. Let me show you why.
Stromgarde will grow again.
See these gems? They're STRENGTH!
Light, guide this knight if he is true!
We can manage-- with the right tactics. Remember, we have families awaiting us. Bring these villains to justice!
Pursue justice, for this world has none!
Blessing of Might! Go with my Blessing. A flash of light! I haven't forgotten my spells. If I die, who will rebuild Stromgarde? ... should I leave for home now? An unholy sight! The Witherbark lurk in the bushes! Trolls. Trolls everywhere. If there's a troll, there's an orc. Remember that. Hey, I specced ret! Hit me! Seal of Blood! Seal of Blood! You're so slow! I called for you minutes ago. ... I will never do arenas with you. Our party composition is garbage. Where's my potion!? I carry this team! I deserve the credit! You deserve nothing. Hordes of them surround my home... ... my home still lives by merit of war's boredom. ... war is boredom punctuated by pulsating terror. We can only buy armor one piece at a time in the arena! Gold? Why do we need gold to buy weapons and armor? Ah, we can't buy better weapons. We're not skilled enough. I... should return home. Let me fall back, I must write a letter. I need some time. You first-- I'll strike after! No! You will not hit me again! Moving back, they are going to attack me. One more scar for a veteran. Reach for my sword, and I'll trade you a fist. How I have MISSED arenas! Excuse me! I'd like a new sword! I have the points. Boots, please. This is the armor vendor, right? Ah, I was mistaken. Vendor's that way. Why do we have four in a 3v3? Seriously, why do we have four in a 3v3? Someone leave. I'll join my kinsmen in the afterlife... Why return to rubble? There is no higher rank than gladiator. This sword deserves a new gladiator. I earned this armor then, not now. I... can't recall where I should go. The glory is mine! I want top damage! I can 1v3, why should this stop me? No points, no paladin. Eh, I can find a better team. I'm done. I am not supposed to be here. Why!? I must escape! No, I'll be rooted for days! They'll knock me out! It's a bad idea. Not for me! Just heal me and I'll do the rest. I'd rather find a better team. Forget me. Escape and live. It's not worth the effort. Regroup. ... it can't work. No mana! It's on cooldown! Can't use that in arena! What we're doing isn't working! They know our tactics! Use anything! EVERYTHING! Take a break. I got this. No worries-- I'll do something new. GET THEM! You're all garbage. WHY DID I JOIN YOU!? I'd rather fight solo. My judgment is better. HAH, get it!? Forget you. Every man for himself! I... can't. No, it won't help me return home. I'm not worthy of this weapon any more. I do what I please. Did it work last time? Trying new tactics! It just came off cooldown! ... I hope it remains quiet, tonight. Nights like these in Stromgarde foreshadow an attack... ... will I ever return home? They were skilled! What are our odds? ... I forgot Divine Shield. Keep that fire high! Shadows betray their motives... This has been fun so far! This is enjoyable! I love to fight! My last team and I won the arena. This team? Couldn't win a fish bowl. Look, just listen to me, and I'll carry you to the top. You all need to do arenas for a year. This is pathetic. Hey, you save some extra food for me? Where's second servings? If I'm going to carry you, I need more food! We need an end... is this one so bad? This will not end well for us. We ought to return to the Hamlet. I'm surprised we don't bring mana potions... I'm surprised by the lack of pillar use in our fights. Do you use mana? Right here! *whispers* Back me up, team. Duel me! Let this paladin's tale come to an end. I'm ready for death. Hey, hit the paladin! I have no defensive abilities! Stop betraying our motives! You're giving away our tactics! We're losing because of you! Leave the team. You're dead weight. It's all in the plan! Mind control! I swear! Let's not discuss that parry. Break yourselves upon my body! Bury me with this sword. I'll bait them with my life. Flee. I'm used to it! Mind control! We cannot leave now. They'll ambush, we can't. This will be my end of my tale. Send news of my death to Stromgarde. This is a great battle, why would you want to leave it? We'll win! Trust me! We need to end this battle. I am no coward! Let's just finish them quickly. They're too strong! Maybe we can regroup? It's a trap! They're baiting us! Get them off! Need healing! Bring it. Yes, focus the paladin! Where's the priest? Where's my shield!? This is too much! I... tremble!? I had to remain defensive! I can't focus! Woops. I gave it a fair chance. Evasion! Am I not hit capped? We'll lose if we hit like that. I'm dead at this rate... Pathetic. Hardly noticed. It probably couldn't dodge, anyway. Overpower. Good technique. They're going to follow-up! That's it! We're dead! We're going to die if you keep missing! LIGHT, SAVE US FROM THIS FOOL! You damnable scrub! Get hit capped! I'd like a team that lands abilities. I'd have more luck 1v3. You're not keeping ME alive, at this rate. Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to leave if that's your best. Uh... let's retreat. Will you follow-up!? What!? Was that fun? That seemed strong. A fly would have done more damage. With damage like that, you'll never win the arena. Guaranteed hit? Bit cheap. Ah, overpower. Good technique. They'll kill you! What-- how did you miss? They'll demolish us! They're just better than we are! Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? They're-- everywhere! Come on, I'm itching for a fight. No, here suits me. Scrub, you don't tell me what to do. You're all garbage. I'm staying at my pillar. I demand a pillar. Where's the pillar? No, might be corrupted. Could be poisoned. No. Why do you think this armor is red? I choose blood. That is meaningless... There is no reason to do that... I didn't buy that! Wait-- are you sure it's a potion? I have necrosis! No-- it's a trap! Shadow priest! Noob. When I need to, scrub. Why are you such a casual? Trivial. There is only one ending for this. It won't make or break the fight. I don't need that right now. No! The light will mend me. Honor compels me in this duel. I'm good for now. This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. Send it to my kin. Keep it for yourself. It's just wasted on me. Are you a shadow priest? Don't need it. It's a duel!
That was so weak! I must say I am quite disappointed. Get good. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... I see... the Light! We shouldn't rest here. This place is cursed. There are so many more. Trolls would strike! I know they're coming. They will end us in our sleep. We need to fight something soon... I'm ready to win. Let's move on? Let's duel while we're here! You're all green. It shows. Your best is not good enough. Should have found better companions. Can I use your potion? I don't feel like it. Give me a moment to recover. This journey will end us. The results will be the same. I feel our end coming. Let's sleep with two eyes open. We don't need sleep. Flee to the bedcovers! This is a bad idea. That won't help us survive. Gestures of a fool! It'll kill me! All I need is the battlefield. No, I'd rather a sword. No, I don't a scrub like you! No, we're better off without you. No need for that, but alright, i will play along. Let me rest a bit. This doesn't change anything. We are doomed. No point. I will lead us to victory. Not you. It's not for me. Do we really need to eat now? This doesn't taste right. Fighting's all the food I need! I'm good to go, thanks. I'm ready without it. It can always use a bit more salt. I wish we had some chicken. I would love a steak right now. Let's eat later. Eh, it tastes horrible!
-----------------------------------------------------------

Paladin The paladin wears plate armor won through success in arena combat. It was bathed in the blood of his final enemy, a nefarious shadow priest. It protects well, and doesn't hinder mobility much.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Paladin calls upon divine magic to assist allies while smiting his enemies. He gathers divine energy through holy strikes and judgments, powering his abilities. Upon noticing support spells, enemies will be likely to attack him.
In war, the Paladin inspired his comrades with displays of courage and tales of returning home. They were less likely to crack under pressure, and survived terrible bodily afflictions. Each blow upon his body strengthens his will.
We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads. We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads.

I did this daily in the arena. Why not use a spell? Out of mana! These are special Frostweave Bandages.
Like Stromgarde, this place has hope. Remain stout. The Light shines upon us. Hey, the worst is behind us.
If they're well armored, aim for joins and exposures. Stand with me. I'll defend you, my friend. You'll be fine with me-- I earned this blade.
My homeland was once a majestic military nation. It may be in ruins, but it'll live through me. I joined the defense of a legendary bridge in my youth. My nation fought alone for days-- but it held the line. We will, too. I dream of settling with my family. After this is finished, I'd like to be neighbors with you all.
My homeland was reduced to rubble. They'll pay for that. *He sharpens his blade with a whetstone, hypnotically focused.* My parents died to forest trolls. I enlisted the next day.
Breathe. The pain should subside. In my youth, I could use this spell non-stop! Now... Your face has some color again. Good.
My body won't break before they do. Let them target me. I'm used to it. "Focus the paladin!" Hah, never gets old.
...
No... Let this veteran rest. I'm comfortable as I am. I recall defending Thandol Span without you.
Justice. I will save my country. One fewer to pillage our granary, eh? My nation taught me war! What did yours teach you? I learned THAT in the arena! Break yourselves upon my body! Vengeance for Stromgarde!
No-- I must survive!
There are trolls in the bushes!
OF COURSE! Hit the paladin. An old strategy!
We're Light-forsaken scrubs.
I never get enough!
Stromgarde will remain a ruin...
I need more Conquest for my shoes!
Formations! Hold, and we'll claim victory!
I will defend you with my life!
Attack the back row. Control the front.
I'm a Gladiator. Let me show you why.
Stromgarde will grow again.
See these gems? They're STRENGTH!
Light, guide this knight if he is true!
We can manage-- with the right tactics. Remember, we have families awaiting us. Bring these villains to justice!
Pursue justice, for this world has none!
Blessing of Might! Go with my Blessing. A flash of light! I haven't forgotten my spells. If I die, who will rebuild Stromgarde? ... should I leave for home now? An unholy sight! The Witherbark lurk in the bushes! Trolls. Trolls everywhere. If there's a troll, there's an orc. Remember that. Hey, I specced ret! Hit me! Seal of Blood! Seal of Blood! You're so slow! I called for you minutes ago. ... I will never do arenas with you. Our party composition is garbage. Where's my potion!? I carry this team! I deserve the credit! You deserve nothing. Hordes of them surround my home... ... my home still lives by merit of war's boredom. ... war is boredom punctuated by pulsating terror. We can only buy armor one piece at a time in the arena! Gold? Why do we need gold to buy weapons and armor? Ah, we can't buy better weapons. We're not skilled enough. I... should return home. Let me fall back, I must write a letter. I need some time. You first-- I'll strike after! No! You will not hit me again! Moving back, they are going to attack me. One more scar for a veteran. Reach for my sword, and I'll trade you a fist. How I have MISSED arenas! Excuse me! I'd like a new sword! I have the points. Boots, please. This is the armor vendor, right? Ah, I was mistaken. Vendor's that way. Why do we have four in a 3v3? Seriously, why do we have four in a 3v3? Someone leave. I'll join my kinsmen in the afterlife... Why return to rubble? There is no higher rank than gladiator. This sword deserves a new gladiator. I earned this armor then, not now. I... can't recall where I should go. The glory is mine! I want top damage! I can 1v3, why should this stop me? No points, no paladin. Eh, I can find a better team. I'm done. I am not supposed to be here. Why!? I must escape! No, I'll be rooted for days! They'll knock me out! It's a bad idea. Not for me! Just heal me and I'll do the rest. I'd rather find a better team. Forget me. Escape and live. It's not worth the effort. Regroup. ... it can't work. No mana! It's on cooldown! Can't use that in arena! What we're doing isn't working! They know our tactics! Use anything! EVERYTHING! Take a break. I got this. No worries-- I'll do something new. GET THEM! You're all garbage. WHY DID I JOIN YOU!? I'd rather fight solo. My judgment is better. HAH, get it!? Forget you. Every man for himself! I... can't. No, it won't help me return home. I'm not worthy of this weapon any more. I do what I please. Did it work last time? Trying new tactics! It just came off cooldown! ... I hope it remains quiet, tonight. Nights like these in Stromgarde foreshadow an attack... ... will I ever return home? They were skilled! What are our odds? ... I forgot Divine Shield. Keep that fire high! Shadows betray their motives... This has been fun so far! This is enjoyable! I love to fight! My last team and I won the arena. This team? Couldn't win a fish bowl. Look, just listen to me, and I'll carry you to the top. You all need to do arenas for a year. This is pathetic. Hey, you save some extra food for me? Where's second servings? If I'm going to carry you, I need more food! We need an end... is this one so bad? This will not end well for us. We ought to return to the Hamlet. I'm surprised we don't bring mana potions... I'm surprised by the lack of pillar use in our fights. Do you use mana? Right here! *whispers* Back me up, team. Duel me! Let this paladin's tale come to an end. I'm ready for death. Hey, hit the paladin! I have no defensive abilities! Stop betraying our motives! You're giving away our tactics! We're losing because of you! Leave the team. You're dead weight. It's all in the plan! Mind control! I swear! Let's not discuss that parry. Break yourselves upon my body! Bury me with this sword. I'll bait them with my life. Flee. I'm used to it! Mind control! We cannot leave now. They'll ambush, we can't. This will be my end of my tale. Send news of my death to Stromgarde. This is a great battle, why would you want to leave it? We'll win! Trust me! We need to end this battle. I am no coward! Let's just finish them quickly. They're too strong! Maybe we can regroup? It's a trap! They're baiting us! Get them off! Need healing! Bring it. Yes, focus the paladin! Where's the priest? Where's my shield!? This is too much! I... tremble!? I had to remain defensive! I can't focus! Woops. I gave it a fair chance. Evasion! Am I not hit capped? We'll lose if we hit like that. I'm dead at this rate... Pathetic. Hardly noticed. It probably couldn't dodge, anyway. Overpower. Good technique. They're going to follow-up! That's it! We're dead! We're going to die if you keep missing! LIGHT, SAVE US FROM THIS FOOL! You damnable scrub! Get hit capped! I'd like a team that lands abilities. I'd have more luck 1v3. You're not keeping ME alive, at this rate. Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to leave if that's your best. Uh... let's retreat. Will you follow-up!? What!? Was that fun? That seemed strong. A fly would have done more damage. With damage like that, you'll never win the arena. Guaranteed hit? Bit cheap. Ah, overpower. Good technique. They'll kill you! What-- how did you miss? They'll demolish us! They're just better than we are! Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? They're-- everywhere! Come on, I'm itching for a fight. No, here suits me. Scrub, you don't tell me what to do. You're all garbage. I'm staying at my pillar. I demand a pillar. Where's the pillar? No, might be corrupted. Could be poisoned. No. Why do you think this armor is red? I choose blood. That is meaningless... There is no reason to do that... I didn't buy that! Wait-- are you sure it's a potion? I have necrosis! No-- it's a trap! Shadow priest! Noob. When I need to, scrub. Why are you such a casual? Trivial. There is only one ending for this. It won't make or break the fight. I don't need that right now. No! The light will mend me. Honor compels me in this duel. I'm good for now. This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. Send it to my kin. Keep it for yourself. It's just wasted on me. Are you a shadow priest? Don't need it. It's a duel!
That was so weak! I must say I am quite disappointed. Get good. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... I see... the Light! We shouldn't rest here. This place is cursed. There are so many more. Trolls would strike! I know they're coming. They will end us in our sleep. We need to fight something soon... I'm ready to win. Let's move on? Let's duel while we're here! You're all green. It shows. Your best is not good enough. Should have found better companions. Can I use your potion? I don't feel like it. Give me a moment to recover. This journey will end us. The results will be the same. I feel our end coming. Let's sleep with two eyes open. We don't need sleep. Flee to the bedcovers! This is a bad idea. That won't help us survive. Gestures of a fool! It'll kill me! All I need is the battlefield. No, I'd rather a sword. No, I don't a scrub like you! No, we're better off without you. No need for that, but alright, i will play along. Let me rest a bit. This doesn't change anything. We are doomed. No point. I will lead us to victory. Not you. It's not for me. Do we really need to eat now? This doesn't taste right. Fighting's all the food I need! I'm good to go, thanks. I'm ready without it. It can always use a bit more salt. I wish we had some chicken. I would love a steak right now. Let's eat later. Eh, it tastes horrible!

Paladin The paladin wears plate armor won through success in arena combat. It was bathed in the blood of his final enemy, a nefarious shadow priest. It protects well, and doesn't hinder mobility much.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Paladin calls upon divine magic to assist allies while smiting his enemies. He gathers divine energy through holy strikes and judgments, powering his abilities. Upon noticing support spells, enemies will be likely to attack him.
In war, the Paladin inspired his comrades with displays of courage and tales of returning home. They were less likely to crack under pressure, and survived terrible bodily afflictions. Each blow upon his body strengthens his will.
We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads. We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads.

This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. Send it to my kin. Keep it for yourself. It's just wasted on me. That was so weak! I must say I am quite disappointed. Get good. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... I see... the Light! We shouldn't rest here. This place is cursed. There are so many more. Trolls would strike! I know they're coming. They will end us in our sleep. We need to fight something soon... I'm ready to win. Let's move on? Let's duel while we're here! You're all green. It shows. Paladin The paladin wears plate armor won through success in arena combat. It was bathed in the blood of his final enemy, a nefarious shadow priest. It protects well, and doesn't hinder mobility much.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Paladin calls upon divine magic to assist allies while smiting his enemies. He gathers divine energy through holy strikes and judgments, powering his abilities. Upon noticing support spells, enemies will be likely to attack him.
In war, the Paladin inspired his comrades with displays of courage and tales of returning home. They were less likely to crack under pressure, and survived terrible bodily afflictions. Each blow upon his body strengthens his will.
We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads. We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads.

Oddycha... bl bdzie mala... Jak byem mody mogem to wyleczy czarami. Teraz... Ich twarz winna mie ten kolor...

wiatoci, prowad swego rycerza!
Trzymajc szyk damy sobie rad. Pamitajcie o swojej rodzinie i przyjaci. Bi zoczycw dla sprawiedliwoci!
Dbajcie o sprawiedliwo tutaj, bo inaczej nigdzie jej nie bdzie!
Bogosawiestwo mocy! Idcie z mym bogosawiestwem. Ciao wiatoci! Nie zapomiaem swoich czarw. Jak umr, to kto zadba o Stromgarde? ... powinienem terac uciec do domu? Niewite widoki! Trolle w krzakach! Widz lad plagi umarych na twej szyi... Jeeli s tu trolle, to s te i orkowie. Pamitam... Hej! Chciaem uciec! Uderz mnie! Skrzep krwi! Nie zmieni mnie w zmarlaka, jak bd bez krwi! Ty limaku! Jeste o minut za pno! ... nie nadawaby si na gladiatora. Nasza kompania to poraka. Gdzie me potiony!? Jestem gow osi zespou! Gdzie kasa dla mnie?! Nikt was nie potrzebuje. Czy Horda znw spali mj dom... ... czy zaznam w kocu spokj od wojny? ... wojna to nieustanny pulsujcy bl istnienia. Moemy kupi tylko jedn pyt dziennie! Zoto? Kto potrzebuje zota majc zby? Ah. Nie jestemy godni na nowe fanty. Nie mamy do wykaaczek... Ja... powinienem uciec do domu. Osaniajce moje tyy! Musz napisa list do dzieci. Dajcie mi chwilk... Ty pierwszy - musz widzie co robisz! NIE! Nie dam ci si mi uderzy! Z drogi! Ten chce mnie uderzy! Powinienem mie dodatkowe blizny. Nadziejcie si na mj miecz! Nie zgubi si na polu bitwy! Sorka, ale chciabym potestowa swoj zbroj. Buty! Co wy czynicie?! Czy moje zby mierdz? Powchaj. Ah! Pomyliem si. Na targ to tdy? Nie trzymalimy z tyu piwa? Powanie, dlaczego amiemy zasady w duelu 3v3? Pjd do swych rodzicw w zawiatach... Wszystko i tak obruci si w gruz. Jestem stary, ale nie jary. Ten miecz zasuguje na lepszy los. Nie winienem uszkadza tej zbroi. Ja... nie powinienem tu by. Chwaa bdzie moja! Chc by najprzedniejszy! Mog mie wyszy poziom ni 6. Czemu mnie blokujecie? Bez profitw nie pomog. Eh, poszukam lepszego teamu. Ja ju skoczyem swoje. Nie powinno mnie tu by. A czemu ja!? Musz spieprza! Nie! Przez Twe usta mwi ciemno! Oni pukaj po mnie! To naprawd zy pomys. Nie po mnie! Tylko troszk odsapn... Wolabym znale lepszych kompanw. Zapomnijcie o mnie. Uciekajcie i zapomniejcie. To nie dziaa! wiato wymaga staej pracy, za mrok ju nie. A mnie siy opuszczaj... Krew wysadza mi uszy! Czas na cooldown! WIATO MNIE OLEPIA! Twj spisek mnie irytuje! Oni znaj nasze plany! Musz strze tego kawaka! Nie widzicie tego trolla? Zamcie mnie! Nie martwcie si - wiem lepiej co robi. HURRRAAAA! Jestecie yw padlin... Czemu doczyem was!? Preferuj walk solo. Mj osd jest najlepszy! Zapomnij. Kady pilnuje swego tyka! Rozsdek mnie osabia... Taka droga nie odbuduje osady. Czy mj miecz jeszcze w ogle dziaa? Troch swdzi mnie pacha. Czy ja to jeszcze umiem? Obczajcie tego! Przeami cooldown! Nie liczmy na cich noc. Zanim Stromgarde upado noc bya podobna... Czy kiedykolwiek ocalimy nasze domy? Ten ogie jest zielony! Kto zabra nasze minorki? Kto schowa mj miecz?! Ogie ujawni wasze spiski... Na razie jest fajno! Patrzcie, jak powinny wyglda rany bojowe! Lubiem was przed tym postojem... Z ostatni druyn moglimy zwyciy wszystko. A z wami? Chyba tylko akwarium! Suchajc was nie dojdziemy do potgi. Jestecie aoni. Nie dalibycie rady na arenie. A gdzie ekstra porcja dla mnie? Kto z was bdzie mym sug? Tyle mi zawdziczacie i aujecie dla mnie tego misa?! Potrzebujemy mierci... To nie zakoczy si dobrze dla nas. Osada ju o nas zapomniaa. Jestem zaskoczony brakiem glonojadw... A jak w stopie znajduje si dusza... Czy macie poyczy many? Na prawo! *miech* Tak we mnie trafisz! Pojedynkuj si ze mn! onierze przychodz i odchodz. Mrok zostaje. Nie chc skoczy jak Arthas... Moja zbroja si rozpada! Moja krew oczyci t krain! Jeste skaony! Masz zby trolli! Trzymaj szyk pao! Zgi, przepadnij! Przez Ciebie zdechniemy. Masz zbyt duy mrok w oku! Oni mnie kontroluj! Przysigam! Czy moja bro jest ostra? Zami opr mego ciaa! Spalcie mnie razem z tym mieczem... Mj ywot to pasmo idiotyzmw. Jestem spaczony! Rosn mi rogi! To zy moment. Tam jest zasadzka. Tu powinnimy umrze. Moja mier wzmocni Stromgarde. Tu jest chwalebna bitwa! Czemu mamy ucieka? Zwyci tutaj! Ufajcie mi! Na kocu tej bitwy bdzie dobra nagroda! Tak wam prdko do emerytury? Za mocni! Zreorganizowa si moe? Tam puapka! Nkasz mnie! Precz! MNIE leczcie! Za mao wiata... Tak, focus na mnie! Gdzie jest wiato? Gdzie ma tarcza!? Ti za wiele! *piszczy* Skupiam si na obronie! Nie mog si skupi! Ups. Oni potrzebuj te nadziei. Juni juni jaj! Czy to tylko iluzja? Przegramy, jak nie pokropi was krwi. Musimy czu nadejcie mierci... aosne. Ledno to wida. Jeste zbyt zielony. Powiniene nosi ososia na gowie. Tak upadniemy! Ciemno nadchodzi! Zrobie to specjalnie by mnie zabi! ZDRADZASZ TAK WIATO! Jak moge spudowa?! Druyna frajerw a nie onierzy. Ja bym wiedzia jak trafi. Nastpnym razem oddaj pole dla mnie. Nie wygrasz nie majc hajgrandu. No tak - ma krew trolli. Tak! Otwieraj drog ucieczki! O nie! Bd si mci. CO!? Odwracasz nasz uwag!? To ma by zabawne? Ach! A poczuem t rozkosz. Uciekajc zadaby wiksze szkody. Ten cios na arenie byby uznany za marno. I tak roznosisz zapach dyni. Przypomina mi to ciosy Arthasa. Zabijesz nas! Jakesz spdowa? Demoralizujesz nas! Suysz korupcji! Nie wygrasz nie majc hajgrandu. No tak - ma krew trolli. Jak to tak... Tam ja umr. Co mnie w stop drapie. Tu bdzie lepsza pozycja! Ja tu mog walczy. Nie, tu czuj krew. Pfi. Mam lepiej czu twj smrd? Bdziesz tu suy tylko jako przeszkoda. Ten miecz mnie rozpala. Gdzie jest sup? Tak rozprowadza si korupcja. TRUCIZNA! Czemu pancerz ma by mniej czerwony? Wybieram krew. To marnotractwo... Nic racjonalnego za tym nie przemawia... Ja tego nie kupywaem! Jeeli to nie jest maso... BEZ NARKOZY?! TO JEST KAMSTWO! Kapan cieni! Noob. To mnie osabia. Dlaczego masz tak robi? Marno... To musi si tu skoczy. To nie zakoczy wojen. Nie tymi sowami! Nie! Ta magia jest skaona przez voodoo! To umniejszy honor tego pojedynku! Ja si dobrze czuj. Nie w tym czasie. Czego ciulu? Ja MUSZ to odczuwa! Wytrzymam troch duej - za honor! Jak mam w peni odczuwa rado, jak mi uatwisz robot? Polij to mym krewnym. Zachowaj to sobie. Nie marnuj tego. Czy jeste Kapanem cienia? Won mi std! To jest tylko MJ pojedynek!
Tak sabe! Musz powiedzie, e jestem rozczarowany. Dobrze. Midzy walkami na arenie bywao gorzej! Jak udao si pokona orkw to i tutaj poradzimy. wiato niszczy mrok. Pamitajcie o tym. Widz... wiato! Nie winnimy tu odpoczywa. To miejsce jest przeklte. Nie mamy szans. Trolle nas tu zaatakuj! Wiem, e potpieni czekaj. Umrzemy jak zaniemy. Wkrtce bdziemy walczy... Jestem gotw to walki a nie do spania! Pojedynkujmy si! Jestecie zieloni. Widz to. Twj najlepszy krok to aden krok. Powinienem szuka lepszych przyjaci. Moesz odda mi cae swoje piwo? Nie czuj tego smaku. Poczekajcie przed snem na mnie. Ta ekspedycja jest skoczona. Wynik bdzie marny. Czuj nasz upadek. Ty bdziesz spa z otwartymi oczyma. Jak moecie spa na tych kolcach? Mj kocyk ucieka! Za idea. To nie pomoe przetrwa. Gesty gupca! To mnie zabije! Oprcz szczku ora nic mi nie potrzeba. Nie - do tego mam miecz. Nie masz do honoru na to! Bdzie lepiej bez ciebie. Nie ma koniecznoci na to, ale zrobimy to tak... Reszta dla mnie! Czy to co zmieni. Jestemy straceni! Bez szans. Ja doprowadz do zwyciestwa, nie ty. To nie dla mnie. Naprawd mam to zje? To nie smakuje poprawnie. Jedzenie nie uzyskane z walki jest niczym! Dobrze, dobrze... Idmy ju. Jestem na to gotw. Przydaoby si wicej soli. Czemu kade dziwne miso smakuje jak kurczak? Wolabym stejka. Zjem pniej. Ten chleb na mnie si lampi!!
-----------------------------------------------------------
Paladin The paladin wears plate armor won through success in arena combat. It was bathed in the blood of his final enemy, a nefarious shadow priest. It protects well, and doesn't hinder mobility much.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Paladin calls upon divine magic to assist allies while smiting his enemies. He gathers divine energy through holy strikes and judgments, powering his abilities. Upon noticing support spells, enemies will be likely to attack him.
In war, the Paladin inspired his comrades with displays of courage and tales of returning home. They were less likely to crack under pressure, and survived terrible bodily afflictions. Each blow upon his body strengthens his will.
We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads. We're all coming home. Don't worry, lads.
Divine Storm Holy Light Judgment Hammer of Justice Free Action

Others:
One step closer to home.
Wound Care Encourage Pep Talk Hope Vengeance Cleanse Eye for an Eye Blessing of Kings
Seal of Command Seal of Insight "This is my last adventure. I will return home." Seal of Blood Wistful Locket "This is my last adventure. I will return home." Seal of Justice Seal of Sanctuary Seal of Vengeance Winds of Forgiveness "Forgive me of the evil I commit. I do it for our family." Offensive Skill
I did this daily in the arena. Why not use a spell? Out of mana! These are special Frostweave Bandages.
Like Stromgarde, this place has hope. Remain stout. The Light shines upon us. Hey, the worst is behind us.
If they're well armored, aim for joins and exposures. Stand with me. I'll defend you, my friend. You'll be fine with me-- I earned this blade.
My homeland was once a majestic military nation. It may be in ruins, but it'll live through me. I joined the defense of a legendary bridge in my youth. My nation fought alone for days-- but it held the line. We will, too. I dream of settling with my family. After this is finished, I'd like to be neighbors with you all.
My homeland was reduced to rubble. They'll pay for that. *He sharpens his blade with a whetstone, hypnotically focused.* My parents died to forest trolls. I enlisted the next day.
Breathe. The pain should subside. In my youth, I could use this spell non-stop! Now... Your face has some color again. Good.
My body won't break before they do. Let them target me. I'm used to it. "Focus the paladin!" Hah, never gets old.
...
No... Let this veteran rest. I'm comfortable as I am. I recall defending Thandol Span without you.
Justice. I will save my country. One fewer to pillage our granary, eh? My nation taught me war! What did yours teach you? I learned THAT in the arena! Break yourselves upon my body! Vengeance for Stromgarde!
A fierce veteran of holy purpose, he has come to cleanse this land through war and prayer. Deus Vult
No-- I must survive!
There are trolls in the bushes!
OF COURSE! Hit the paladin. An old strategy!
We're Light-forsaken scrubs.
I never get enough!
Stromgarde will remain a ruin...
I need more Conquest for my shoes!
Formations! Hold, and we'll claim victory!
I will defend you with my life!
Attack the back row. Control the front.
I'm a Gladiator. Let me show you why.
Stromgarde will grow again.
See these gems? They're STRENGTH!
Light, guide this knight if he is true!
We can manage-- with the right tactics. Remember, we have families awaiting us. Bring these villains to justice!
Pursue justice, for this world has none!
Blessing of Might! Go with my Blessing. A flash of light! I haven't forgotten my spells. If I die, who will rebuild Stromgarde? ... should I leave for home now? An unholy sight! The Witherbark lurk in the bushes! Trolls. Trolls everywhere. If there's a troll, there's an orc. Remember that. Hey, I specced ret! Hit me! Seal of Blood! Seal of Blood! You're so slow! I called for you minutes ago. ... I will never do arenas with you. Our party composition is garbage. Where's my potion!? I carry this team! I deserve the credit! You deserve nothing. Hordes of them surround my home... ... my home still lives by merit of war's boredom. ... war is boredom punctuated by pulsating terror. We can only buy armor one piece at a time in the arena! Gold? Why do we need gold to buy weapons and armor? Ah, we can't buy better weapons. We're not skilled enough. I... should return home. Let me fall back, I must write a letter. I need some time. You first-- I'll strike after! No! You will not hit me again! Moving back, they are going to attack me. One more scar for a veteran. Reach for my sword, and I'll trade you a fist. How I have MISSED arenas! Excuse me! I'd like a new sword! I have the points. Boots, please. This is the armor vendor, right? Ah, I was mistaken. Vendor's that way. Why do we have four in a 3v3? Seriously, why do we have four in a 3v3? Someone leave. I'll join my kinsmen in the afterlife... Why return to rubble? There is no higher rank than gladiator. This sword deserves a new gladiator. I earned this armor then, not now. I... can't recall where I should go. The glory is mine! I want top damage! I can 1v3, why should this stop me? No points, no paladin. Eh, I can find a better team. I'm done. I am not supposed to be here. Why!? I must escape! No, I'll be rooted for days! They'll knock me out! It's a bad idea. Not for me! Just heal me and I'll do the rest. I'd rather find a better team. Forget me. Escape and live. It's not worth the effort. Regroup. ... it can't work. No mana! It's on cooldown! Can't use that in arena! What we're doing isn't working! They know our tactics! Use anything! EVERYTHING! Take a break. I got this. No worries-- I'll do something new. GET THEM! You're all garbage. WHY DID I JOIN YOU!? I'd rather fight solo. My judgment is better. HAH, get it!? Forget you. Every man for himself! I... can't. No, it won't help me return home. I'm not worthy of this weapon any more. I do what I please. Did it work last time? Trying new tactics! It just came off cooldown! ... I hope it remains quiet, tonight. Nights like these in Stromgarde foreshadow an attack... ... will I ever return home? They were skilled! What are our odds? ... I forgot Divine Shield. Keep that fire high! Shadows betray their motives... This has been fun so far! This is enjoyable! I love to fight! My last team and I won the arena. This team? Couldn't win a fish bowl. Look, just listen to me, and I'll carry you to the top. You all need to do arenas for a year. This is pathetic. Hey, you save some extra food for me? Where's second servings? If I'm going to carry you, I need more food! We need an end... is this one so bad? This will not end well for us. We ought to return to the Hamlet. I'm surprised we don't bring mana potions... I'm surprised by the lack of pillar use in our fights. Do you use mana? Right here! *whispers* Back me up, team. Duel me! Let this paladin's tale come to an end. I'm ready for death. Hey, hit the paladin! I have no defensive abilities! Stop betraying our motives! You're giving away our tactics! We're losing because of you! Leave the team. You're dead weight. It's all in the plan! Mind control! I swear! Let's not discuss that parry. Break yourselves upon my body! Bury me with this sword. I'll bait them with my life. Flee. I'm used to it! Mind control! We cannot leave now. They'll ambush, we can't. This will be my end of my tale. Send news of my death to Stromgarde. This is a great battle, why would you want to leave it? We'll win! Trust me! We need to end this battle. I am no coward! Let's just finish them quickly. They're too strong! Maybe we can regroup? It's a trap! They're baiting us! Get them off! Need healing! Bring it. Yes, focus the paladin! Where's the priest? Where's my shield!? This is too much! I... tremble!? I had to remain defensive! Overpower. Good technique. They're going to follow-up! That's it! We're dead! We're going to die if you keep missing! LIGHT, SAVE US FROM THIS FOOL! You damnable scrub! Get hit capped! I'd like a team that lands abilities. I'd have more luck 1v3. You're not keeping ME alive, at this rate. Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to leave if that's your best. Uh... let's retreat. Will you follow-up!? What!? Was that fun? That seemed strong. A fly would have done more damage. With damage like that, you'll never win the arena. Guaranteed hit? Bit cheap. Ah, overpower. Good technique. They'll kill you! What-- how did you miss? They'll demolish us! They're just better than we are! Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? They're-- everywhere! Come on, I'm itching for a fight. No, here suits me. Scrub, you don't tell me what to do. You're all garbage. I'm staying at my pillar. I demand a pillar. Where's the pillar? No, might be corrupted. Could be poisoned. No. Why do you think this armor is red? I choose blood. That is meaningless... There is no reason to do that... I didn't buy that! Wait-- are you sure it's a potion? I have necrosis! No-- it's a trap! Shadow priest! Noob. When I need to, scrub. Why are you such a casual? Trivial. There is only one ending for this. It won't make or break the fight. I don't need that right now. No! The light will mend me. Honor compels me in this duel. I'm good for now. This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. Send it to my kin. Keep it for yourself. It's just wasted on me. That was so weak! I must say I am quite disappointed. Get good. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... I see... the Light! We shouldn't rest here. This place is cursed. There are so many more. Trolls would strike! I know they're coming. They will end us in our sleep. We need to fight something soon... I'm ready to win. Let's move on? Let's duel while we're here! You're all green. It shows. I'm good to go, thanks. I'm ready without it. It can always use a bit more salt. I wish we had some chicken. I would love a steak right now. Let's eat later. Eh, it tastes horrible!
